summary: Reworked the orginal mod of countercruel. Addes a extra room.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/nahkin1kb2rpejd0.jpg[/img]

[color=#f87217][size=+3]Imperial Real Esatate - Vanguard Cabin [u]REWORKED[/u][/size][/color]
[size=+2][i]\"This is a rework of the original and fantastic work of the Modder [color=orange]countercruel[/color]. Please visit the orginal
Mod page and give him appropriate credit for this awsome work.\"[/i][/size]


[b][u]Original Mod:[/u][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31942]Imperial Real Estate - Vanguard Cabin[/url]


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Description:[/size][/color]

For the moment you won\'t see fancy designs or so of the Description. As this mod originally was created by the awsome Modder [color=orange]countercruel[/color].
I am happy that he allowed me to upload my edited version of this house.
He puts a lot of detail in his work and everything he does seems to be harmonic and like it has always been there from the beginning.
I\'ve tried to do my best to let the additional room fit into the style of the house.

I included a additional room for collectors under the river and also slightly changed the Smithery and the Cabin itself. You will see that 
the room under the river has a fitting celling which looks really like you under the river.


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Features:[/size][/color]

Cabin:
------

[u]original:[/u]
-Your very own smithy building to store and smelt away!
-A cabin set in the woodland and built by the Imperials
-Rich diverse flora surrounding the cabin and smithy with hand placed objects from Vanilla and Dragonborn DLC\'s.
-Completely performance friendly
-Landscape built by scratch to house the home
-A garden with a amazing view of the lakes of skyrim
-Dwemer controlled Waterwheel

-) Added a Mannequin
-) Added more design elements to the workdesk
-) Fixed some lightning


Smithery:
---------

-) Removed the Alchemy area and designed the Enchanting area more detailed
-) Fixed some lightning issues
-) fine tuned some objects


Secret Treasure Room:
---------------------

-) added large room under the river
-) Mannequins for displaying stuff
-) Weapon racks
-) Weapon plagues
-) Display cases
-) detailed and harmonic design
-) 2 waterfalls integrated into the room
-) a connection between the main Cabin and the Smithery
-) Alchemists Area (lots of details and Resources used)
-) a lot more ;)


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Installation:[/size][/color]

Use either the NMM to install this mod or just drop the .bsa and the .esp into your Data folder of Skyrim.


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Uninstallation:[/size][/color]

Use again either the NMM or manually delte the .bsa and the .esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Troubleshooting:[/size][/color]

--> The mod should perfectly fit into the original style of the house. So I hope everything looks quit ajusted.
--> The mod was cleaned with Tes5Edit
--> You need [color=red][size=+1.5]Dragonborn DLC[/size][/color] for it to work
--> It\'s all incompatible with the original Cabin or other mods that alter that specific place


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Credits:[/size][/color]

BIG THANKS to the author of the original mod !!!
[size=+2][b]GIVE HIM ENDORSES !!![/b][/size]

Also big thanks to
--> Blary for his/her resources
--> Oaristys & Tony67 for his/her resources
they do a fantastic work


[color=#f87217][size=+1]Legal:[/size][/color]

You are not allowed to upload this mod somewhere else. The only two sites where you can download it are:
--> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com]SkyrimNexus[/url]
--> [url=http://www.tesalliance.org]TES Alliance[/url]

It\'s also not allowed to use any part of the mod except the resources I used. Please ask the original author first or me if you want to use parts
he or I did.
Now have fun with it ;).


[img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/othermodshsn196alb4.jpg[/img]

This Image can be copied and posted in your mod Description. It should help small mods (that are worth it) or mods that you think are underated, to get more attention.
Just copy the following line to your mod description and embed it at the end or somewhere you want. Afterwards just write the mods or link you want to mention

[color=orange][u]Image: [/u][/color] [\"img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/othermodshsn196alb4.jpg[/img\"] (without the quotes \"\\\")

[u]My other mods: [/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3507075]Nahkins mods[/url]

[u]Insanitys Work: [/u]
JUST awsome!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/258945]Insanitys mods[/url]

[u]countercruel Mod page:[/u]
Awsome Modder. A lot of detail in his work.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1492408]countercruel Mods[/url]
author: Nahkin and countercruel
